priorVersion.title: CDISC SDTM Other Disposition Event Response Terminology

rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C150811

self.title: CDISC SDTM Other Disposition Event Response Terminology

definition: A terminology codelist relevant to other important events that occur during a trial but are not driven by protocol requirements.
name: Other Disposition Event Response
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Other Disposition Event Response Terminology

terms.definition: The study subject has been assigned to a different study site.
A study event during which the treatment assignment is made known to the subject, investigator, and/or other trial personnel.

The subject or parent/guardian withdraws their consent for the subject to participate in certain protocol-specified study activities, but does not withdraw consent from participation in the study as a whole.
terms.preferredTerm: Withdrawal of Consent From Protocol-Specified Activity
terms.submissionValue: WITHDRAWAL OF CONSENT FROM PROTOCOL-SPECIFIED ACTIVITY
